data.title: The Drowsy Chaperone - Wikipedia
data.meta_description: The Drowsy Chaperone - Wikipedia - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The Drowsy Chaperone is a musical that parodies 1920s musical comedies. It tells the story of a man who plays the record of his favorite musical, The Drowsy Chaperone, and the characters come to life in his apartment as he comments on the story and actors. The fictional musical is about a Broadway star getting married and cancelling her wedding, with several subplots involving producers trying to stop the wedding. The man provides commentary throughout and shares aspects of his own life. It debuted in 1998 and has been widely produced, winning multiple awards including Tony awards.
